comments.creator: mounir@lamouri.fr
comments.author: mounir@lamouri.fr
comments.text:
If something wants to send a message to a child process knowing its id, it currently has to send to all child processes because it's only possible to know the child process id from the child process.

The fix should be trivial.
comments.raw_text:
If something wants to send a message to a child process knowing its id, it currently has to send to all child processes because it's only possible to know the child process id from the child process.

The fix should be trivial.
